summary: Drown
title: Drown
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2H347bJ

by Heckyheck_Icravedeath

It’s been a few months since the Snap and Tony Stark isn’t doing all that well. It gets worse when he has a nightmare and wakes up at 12:30am on August tenth.

Words: 3013, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Peter Parker
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Hurt Tony Stark, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Lmao yeah he’s acting as dead Peter’s dad, oof im sorry, that was mean, anywayyy, dont hate me, i didnt mean to hurt Tony THIS much, I swear, i also didnt mean to hurt Peter this much, I love them both, im a monster, thats fine, i accept it at this point, there is nothing anyone can do, im the Angst Queen dudes, MUAHAHAH, yeah okay im sorry, i hate myself deeply at the moment, im proud of this though, SO, pls like it, be proud of me plssss, i need someone to be proud of me, ahem anyway, be expecting a sad Peter thing soon, ima be an even bigger monster, hahaha get cucked bitch, mkay ill stop now, i get way too carried away with tags lmao

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2H347bJ

read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2H347bJ

summary: Just tell me how you are
title: Just tell me how you are
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2VgaSL6

by Minkey222

“Peter,” Mr Stark yawns, stretched and returned, slumped over in his chair, the bags beneath his eyes like bruises. His skin pale. Sweaty.

“I-” Peter coughed. A glass of water appeared in his hand as if by magic. There was a hand on his shoulder. It didn’t hurt (he wasn’t scared (he was safe (there’s a first time for everything))).

“Peter, what happened?” the voice was small, soft, gentle. It wasn’t like Tony’s voice. It was like someone else was talking through him. It was like he was scared that Peter would float away, disappear, disintegrate if he spoke too loudly.

Words: 4337, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 8 of Peter Parker is young, dumb and reckless (and also in constant pain)

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Rape/Non-Con
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Peter Parker, May Parker (Spider-Man), Ben Parker, Skip Westcott, Flash Thompson
  • Additional Tags: Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Peter Parker Needs a Hug, Hurt/Comfort, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Minor Character Death, Implied/Referenced Suicide, Implied/Referenced Self-Harm, Depression, abuse of brackets, Abuse of Hyphens, Peter Parker isn’t okay, Past Rape/Non-con, Aftermath


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2VgaSL6

summary: Happy Birthday to John Vernon! John voiced The Sub-Mariner (1966) and Iron Man/Tony Stark (1966) He also voiced Major Glenn...
caption:
Happy Birthday to John Vernon!

John voiced The Sub-Mariner (1966) and Iron Man/Tony Stark (1966)

He also voiced Major Glenn Talbot (Hulk - 1966), Dr. Doom (Fantastic Four - 1994), Doctor Strange (Spider-Man - 1996) and General Ross (The Incredible Hulk - 1996).

reblog.comment:

He also voiced Major Glenn Talbot (Hulk - 1966), Dr. Doom (Fantastic Four - 1994), Doctor Strange (Spider-Man - 1996) and General Ross (The Incredible Hulk - 1996).

He also voiced Major Glenn Talbot (Hulk - 1966), Dr. Doom (Fantastic Four - 1994), Doctor Strange (Spider-Man - 1996) and General Ross (The Incredible Hulk - 1996).

summary: Nocipathy
title: Nocipathy
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EdXEb8

by JenJo, jojosflyingcircus, Lissadiane, msraven, pietray, VoicesOffCamera

Bucky and Clint are finally going on their first date, but they should have known better than to expect things to go smoothly.

What starts with Bucky believing he’d been stood up turns into a race against the clock to save Clint’s life. Between a kidnapping plot, a rescue mission that doesn’t go as planned, life-threatening injuries, and a telepathic skill that Bucky had no idea HYDRA had implanted in his mind, Clint and Bucky will learn just how much they really mean to each other.

Words: 16135, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel (Comics)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Bruce Banner
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Clint Barton
  • Additional Tags: MCU!Bucky, comics!clint, Accidental Telepathy, Non-Graphic Violence, Non-Graphic Descriptions of Torture, Whump, Blood, Pain, loss of consciousness, Near Death, Eventual Happy Ending


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EdXEb8

summary: “Iron Man.” That’s kind of catchy. It’s got a nice ring to it. I mean, it’s not technically accurate. The suit’s a gold-titanium...
caption: “Iron Man.” That’s kind of catchy. It’s got a nice ring to it. I mean, it’s not technically accurate. The suit’s a gold-titanium alloy, but it’s kind of evocative, the imagery, anyway.

reblog.comment: “Iron Man.” That’s kind of catchy. It’s got a nice ring to it. I mean, it’s not technically accurate. The suit’s a gold-titanium alloy, but it’s kind of evocative, the imagery, anyway.

trail.content_raw: “Iron Man.” That’s kind of catchy. It’s got a nice ring to it. I mean, it’s not technically accurate. The suit’s a gold-titanium alloy, but it’s kind of evocative, the imagery, anyway.
trail.content: “Iron Man.” That’s kind of catchy. It’s got a nice ring to it. I mean, it’s not technically accurate. The suit’s a gold-titanium alloy, but it’s kind of evocative, the imagery, anyway.

tags: thank you for getting us to where we are now
hearts ripped out as we wait for endgame
summary: @lookinforanabundanceofpaperstars and I were talking the other day. Remember how The Avengers revolutionized the way we think of...
body:
@lookinforanabundanceofpaperstars and I were talking the other day. Remember how The Avengers revolutionized the way we think of superhero movies? Like, Iron Man kickstarted the franchise and I love Tony, but … The Avengers really was the height of movies at that time for that genre.

They really did that. And look how far we’ve come.

reblog.comment:

They really did that. And look how far we’ve come.

They really did that. And look how far we’ve come.

They really did that. And look how far we’ve come.

summary: Imagine Tony helping Peter steal free food
body:
Imagine Tony helping Peter steal free food

Last year, i was at a rowing competition and some of my teammates and i were sat outside of a pub drinking our drinks peacefully when all of a sudden we realise that one of my friends is missing. It turns out the art gallery in front of the pub we were at was having some sort of expo and there were crisps and small snacks on a table in the middle of the room. We look through the window to see my friend snatching as many crisps as he can from the plates, so his Mum sends his Dad in to go and stop him. We watch through the window as his Dad then goes in and starts helping him steal the crisps and honestly i just feel like this is something Peter and Tony would do.

reblog.comment:

trail.content:
Imagine Tony helping Peter steal free food

Last year, i was at a rowing competition and some of my teammates and i were sat outside of a pub drinking our drinks peacefully when all of a sudden we realise that one of my friends is missing. It turns out the art gallery in front of the pub we were at was having some sort of expo and there were crisps and small snacks on a table in the middle of the room. We look through the window to see my friend snatching as many crisps as he can from the plates, so his Mum sends his Dad in to go and stop him. We watch through the window as his Dad then goes in and starts helping him steal the crisps and honestly i just feel like this is something Peter and Tony would do.

summary: You Need To Know
title: You Need To Know
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EuhlfO

by Moonscar

“Uncle Ben, I have something to tell you” Peter said, his voice coming out with a nervous tremor, but his tone showing that he was about to relay important information. Instantly Ben’s happy expression fell, his eyes getting an almost angry glint to them as he quickly switched the gears on the car.

“No” That was the first word he uttered, shaking his head as he started driving backwards to get out of the parking space “Why would you do this?” Was all that Ben said.  Peter instantly felt his heart drop at those words, because that’s when he realized he had been rejected, realized that Ben wasn’t gonna stand by him with this.

(*based off of my own coming out*)

Words: 3631, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man - All Media Types, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated

  • Relationships: Ben Parker & Peter Parker, May Parker (Spider-Man) & Peter Parker, Ben Parker/May Parker (Spider-Man), Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Ned Leeds & Peter Parker, Michelle Jones & Ned Leeds & Peter Parker

summary: Dom drop tony head cannons? Like tony feeling guilty for being rough with peter idk thanks
question: Dom drop tony head cannons? Like tony feeling guilty for being rough with peter idk thanks
answer:
Hell yes I’m doing this head cannon style

  • Tony and Peter fuck like rabbits
  • They fuck before bed and in the morning and inbetween then
  • It’s never soft vanilla sex either
  • Peter is almost always tied up in one way or another. Tied to the bed, face pushed into the mattress his hands tied behind him, his feet tied to his hands so he’s bent in a way that allows easy access, etc.
  • Peter and Tony love it. Peter loved being Tony’s little slutty minx and tony loves taking control and ruining peter
  • Tony is very serious about safety (he loves peter too much to hurt him)
  • Tony never gags peter he always wants him to be able to say their safe word if needed
  • One day both men have pent up energy, there was a battle and they can feel the adrenaline pumping through them
  • They sneak off their shared bedroom and strip eachother and share messy kissed
  • Peter moans out for tony to spank him
  • Without hesitation tony bends the younger over his knee and starts slapping the plump skin
  • Peter is moaning and squirming on Tony’s lap begging for more and harder
  • Tony keeps slapping the red hot skin but can’t help the feeling in his gut that this isn’t right
  • He keeps slapping waiting for peter to tell him to do something else but the boy just keeps begging tony to continue. Peter wants tony to spank him into submission like always but today he just walks more
  • Tony keep going and he finally breaks skin, the small dropplets of blood on Peter’s aas breaks tony
  • “Strawberry.” He says stopping his movements
  • Peter shoots up to check on tony “hey what’s wrong? Lay down tony let me help you.”
  • Peter pushed tony so he’s laying on the bed and wipes the tears running down Tony’s face
  • Tony tells peter how he feels terrible that he was too rough and he hurt the younger boy
  • Peter holds tony in his arms and tells him that he’s fine
  • “Tony you didn’t hurt me I’m okay, shhh it’s okay.”
  • Tony can’t help but feel terrible as peter comforts him in his arms telling him he did nothing wrong
  • But peter makes sure everything is okay
  • Peter always makes everything okay

blog.description: | #TeamStark | I cry over iron dad so much I made a blog about it | Check out my AO3 @ironfamjam | I follow back from @celestial--queen | I tag amazing irondad fics as #fic rec | Icon made by agentsofedits |

summary: Project Abaddon - Chapter 3 - ironfamjam - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: Project Abaddon - Chapter 3 - ironfamjam - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Project Abaddon Chapter 3 is up! 

Summary: 

I just wanted to be a hero. I wanted to be like you.

When Tony Stark fails to reach out to Peter Parker after managing to avoid a brawl with Steve over the Accords, SHIELD steals an opportunity. They grab it in a chokehold and refuse to let it go.

Caught in the middle of something horrible that promises to change everything and New York on the brink of ripping itself apart, Peter needs to learn who he can trust and who the real villains are before he becomes the one thing he promised he would defeat.

I never meant for this to happen. Mr. Stark…I’m sorry.

Relationships: Tony Stark & Peter Parker, Tony Stark and Avengers Team, Peter Parker and Avengers Team

Tags: Protective Tony Stark, Morally Ambiguous Nick Fury, Irondad, Protective Peter Parker, Anti-SHEILD

blog.description: She/Her! MCU-addict (specializes in loving Tony Stark and the Stark Family, including but not limited to IronDad & Spider-Son and Pepperony)! Loves Dean WInchester, Brooke Davis, Tony Dinozzo, Jake Peralta, Tahani Al Jamil, The Doctor, Han Solo, Jim Kirk, Kara Danvers, Barry Allen, and MOST of the characters that come with all of them!
